mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NO, ORDER_ADDR, MEMBER_ID, ORDER_PHONE, ORDER_NAME, TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS ORDER_DATE, ORDER_STATE, ORDER_PAYMENT, ORDER_EXCHANGE, ORDER_EMAIL, ORDER_TOTALPAYMENT FROM ORDERLIST

SELECT ORDER_NO, ORDER_ADDR, MEMBER_ID, ORDER_PHONE, ORDER_NAME, TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS ORDER_DATE, ORDER_STATE, ORDER_PAYMENT, ORDER_EXCHANGE, ORDER_TOTALPAYMENT, ORDER_EMAIL FROM ORDERLIST WHERE ORDER_STATE = #{ORDER_STATE} OR ORDER_STATE = #{ORDER_STATE2} OR ORDER_STATE = #{ORDER_STATE3}

SELECT ORDER_NO, ORDER_ADDR, MEMBER_ID, ORDER_PHONE, ORDER_NAME, TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS ORDER_DATE, ORDER_STATE, ORDER_PAYMENT, ORDER_EXCHANGE, ORDER_EMAIL, ORDER_TOTALPAYMENT FROM ORDERLIST WHERE ${searchn} LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

SELECT ORDER_NO, ORDER_ADDR, MEMBER_ID, ORDER_PHONE, ORDER_NAME, TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS ORDER_DATE, ORDER_STATE, ORDER_PAYMENT, ORDER_EXCHANGE, ORDER_EMAIL, ORDER_TOTALPAYMENT FROM ORDERLIST WHERE ${searchn} LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND ORDER_STATE = #{ORDER_STATE}

SELECT ORDER_NO, ORDER_ADDR, MEMBER_ID, ORDER_PHONE, ORDER_NAME, TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS ORDER_DATE, ORDER_STATE, ORDER_PAYMENT, ORDER_EXCHANGE, ORDER_EMAIL, ORDER_TOTALPAYMENT FROM ORDERLIST WHERE ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO}
SELECT ORDER_NO, ORDERITEM_NAME, ORDERITEM_COUNT, ORDERITEM_SIZE, ORDERITEM_COLOR, ORDERITEM_PRICE, ORDERITEM_STATE, ORDERITEM_OPTION FROM ORDERDETAIL WHERE ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO}

SELECT sum(orderitem_price*orderitem_count) as sumResult, extract(year from orderitem_date) as year, extract(month from orderitem_date) as month from orderDetail WHERE ORDERITEM_DATE between (ADD_MONTHS( TRUNC(sysdate,'MM'), + (-24) )) AND (ADD_MONTHS( TRUNC(sysdate,'MM'), + (1) )) GROUP BY extract(month from orderitem_date), extract(year from orderitem_date) order by year desc, month desc
SELECT ORDERITEM_NAME, sum(ORDERITEM_COUNT) as COUNT FROM ORDERDETAIL GROUP BY ORDERITEM_NAME ORDER BY COUNT desc

SELECT ORDERITEM_NAME, sum(ORDERITEM_COUNT) as COUNT FROM ORDERDETAIL WHERE ORDERITEM_DATE between (ADD_MONTHS( TRUNC(sysdate,'MM'), + (${INPUTNUM}))) AND (ADD_MONTHS( TRUNC(sysdate,'MM'), + (${INPUTNUM2}))) GROUP BY ORDERITEM_NAME ORDER BY COUNT desc
